fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
- Base: $60
- 1 Shelf: $200
- 2 Shelves: $250
- 3 Shelves: $320
- 4 Shelves: $400
- 5 Shelves: $750

Shelves cost $180 each.

fields.name: Product:
fields.value:
- When you use Cheap Jewelry, you will place it at the Space that you are currently standing on. In the next turn, any opponent who tries to drive by the Jewelry will instead be distracted by it, and forced to stop in at the Space that it was placed on.
- If you're the Owner, you may choose any one of the five Spaces ahead of you, or the Space you're standing on, to place the Cheap Jewelry on.
